response.overview: Belarusian teenager Lesha, who ended up in San Francisco after the events of 2020, tries to stay in touch with his friend who stayed in Belarus and went to prison. He writes them letters, shares stories about his new reality and friends. But life in another country gradually brings new trials and doubts: is it possible to live the new at the same time and not lose the old?
response.tagline: How to live between the past and the new life when friends are on different sides of the world?
response.title: The Letter
